content.text: ( CNN ) She 's back ! " We 're turning it up a notch this year , and I ca n't wait to celebrate all of my fellow amazing artists for another unforgettable night of live music . " She took to Twitter with a cute video announcement , too . Read More There 's no word yet on presenters , performers or nominees . The event will be broadcast live at 8 p.m. ET May 1 on NBC from the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas.Clarkson , who rose to fame as the first winner of " American Idol , " will be one of the executive producers for this year 's awards show .
